description:
The girl who climbed in through Shoichi`s window wasn`t a ghost, but his classmate Hikari. Her appearance at the summer course rejuvenates him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de Hikari Tsuneki Episode 2 : En pleine montagne
Tsuneki Hikari Chapter 2: Deep in the Mountains
常木耀 第2章 ヤマオク
